definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: part, open (Ar. fas.ay I, II. separate, remove; Aram. [[פְּחָא]] esp. set free, pas.i0 Pa. set free);—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: to swallow, fig. of ground, [[הָאֲדָמָה]] Ge 4:11, (J), Nu 16:30 (JE), [[הָאָרֶץ]] De 11:6; of enemies, + [[עַל]] pers. La 2:16, La 3:46, Ps 22:14; lit. Ez Eze 2:8.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: to speak Ju Jdg 11:35, Jdg 11:36 (utter a vow, + ´[[אֶל־י]]); Job 35:16; hence = utter, [[אֲשֶׁר פָּחוּ שְׁפָתַי]] Ps 66:14; of bird chirping [[פּׂחֶה פֶה]] Is 10:14 (in fig.).
snatch away, set free (Aram. loan-word), only Ps 144, + [[הִצִּיל]] c. [[מִן]] v:Ps 144:7; v:Ps 144:11; ´[[פ]] c. [[מִן]] v:Ps 144:10.
